name: Sahuagin Champion

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 8 (1d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit  reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft.  one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage  or 8 (1d8 + 4) if wielded in two hands in melee.

special_abilities.name: Blood Frenzy
special_abilities.desc: The sahuagin has advantage on melee attack rolls against creatures that dont have all their hit points.

special_abilities.name: Limited Amphibiousness
special_abilities.desc: The sahuagin can breathe air and water. When breathing air, it must immerse itself in water once every 4 hours or begin to suffocate.

special_abilities.name: Shark Telepathy
special_abilities.desc: The sahuagin can command any shark within 120 feet of it using magical telepathy.
